title: Noodle salad

default: 100g/3½oz rice noodles, cooked according to packet instructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, honey and chilli flakes into a large bowl and whisk together.
Add the noodles, onion, rocket and orange segments and toss together and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
To serve, place the noodle salad into the centre of a dish.
